title: My game freezes completely when the match starts loading. All game modes affected.
body:
I have uninstalled and re installed the game. Checked all my drivers and Direct X versions are all up to date. 

Can play fine on my other PC but not on this laptop. The game has worked on this system previously.
Have logs that I can upload or provide otherwise if the will help.

replies.body:
I had the same issue and had to restart my com. Couldn't ALT+F4, change windows or anything. This is stupid I better not get banned for this.
Seems like it has something to do with fullscreen according to forums.
